Question: AAC Acoustic Technologies (Shenzhen) Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
AAC Acoustic Technologies (Shenzhen) Co., Ltd.

Product: Miniaturized Acoustic Components

- Manufacture and distribution of miniaturized acoustic components
- Segments include Dynamic Components, Haptics and Radio Frequencies, Micro Electro-Mechanical System Components
- Founded by Zheng Min Pan and Chun Yuan Wu in 1993
- Headquartered in Shenzhen, China
Summary_cn:
AAC声学技术（深圳）有限公司。

产品：微型声学元件

- 制造和销售微型声学元件
- 分类包括动态元件，触觉和无线频率，微电子机械系统元件
- 由郑敏攀和吴春元于1993年创立
- 总部位于中国深圳
